sentences.en: A promoter may incur expense in establishing a company.
sentences.cn: 发起人在创建公司时可能会引起开销.

sentences.en: And operational downtime caused by reliability or performance problems can incur opportunity costs if customers are unable to access your system or the business is unable to do its work.
sentences.cn: 并且如果顾客不能访问你的系统或业务不能进行工作，那么由可靠性或性能问题引起的运作停工就会招致机会成本。

sentences.en: Any costs that you incur will be reimbursed in full.
sentences.cn: 你的所有花费都将全额付还.

sentences.en: Any expenses you may incur will be chargeable to the company.
sentences.cn: 你的所有开销均由本公司支付。

sentences.en: Any expenses you may incur will be chargeable to the company.
sentences.cn: 你的所有开销都可以由公司偿付.

sentences.en: Budget closure: Lapsing of authority to incur approved Budgetary expenses.
sentences.cn: 预算关闭期: 指停止使用已批准的预算支出权力的限期.

sentences.en: Customers will only incur additional call charges if the call is diverted outside the UK.
sentences.cn: 只有当电话被转接到英国之外，客户才会被加收额外的电话费。

sentences.en: I haven't as much to risk if I incur your displeasure.
sentences.cn: 即使惹你不高兴,我也没多大风险可担.

sentences.en: In a case the insurers themselves shall incur equal the compensation liability.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,保险人同等地承担赔偿金责任.

sentences.en: Needless to say, we shall refund any expenses you may incur.
sentences.cn: 不用说, 我们将会偿还你所担负的任何费用.

sentences.en: She wondered what she’d done to incur his displeasure this time.
sentences.cn: 她奇怪她这次做了什么引起他的不悦。

sentences.en: Striking contract on these unfavorable terms will assuredly incur losses on you.
sentences.cn: 以如此不利的条款签约必定使您蒙受损失.

sentences.en: The amount of demurrage Incur be us $ 350.
The extra premium Incur be to be pay by the buyer.
sentences.cn: 额外保险应由买方负担.

sentences.en: The government had also incurred huge debts.
sentences.cn: 政府也已承受了大笔债务。

sentences.en: The shipper shall hold the carriers harmless from any expense they may incur.
sentences.cn: 发货人应赔偿承运人所发生的任何费用.

sentences.en: We undersigned will be liable for all responsibility & cost that may incur.
sentences.cn: 我司承担由此引起的一切风险,责任,费用.

trans.tran_en: if you incur a cost, debt, or a fine, you have to pay money because of something you have done
if you incur a cost, debt, or a fine, you have to pay money because of something you have done
